issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

fields.summary: EMI registered using the same name across regions fails

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

On a federated cloud setup (i.e multiple regions), when using the user credentials from an account from a local region, registering an image in nonnative region fails.
{code}
# euca-describe-regions
REGION	region-1	http://compute.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-2	http://compute.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

## local region 
# euca-describe-availability-zones
AVAILABILITYZONE	region2-az-one	available

## bundle, upload, register EMI in nonnative region
# euca-install-image -b ubuntu-wily-amd64 -i wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -n ubuntu-wily-x86_64 -r x86_64 -U http://objectstorage.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --virtualization-type hvm --cert test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem --privatekey test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem --ec2cert test1-admin/cloud-cert.pem
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.00 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  16.05 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.01 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  16.07 MB/s Time: 0:00:00

/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.03 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  13.92 MB/s Time: 0:00:00

/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.12 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  14.92 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.13 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  16.07 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.14 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  17.41 MB/s Time: 0:00:00

/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.16 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  14.93 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.17 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  14.92 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.18 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  17.41 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.19 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  16.07 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.20 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  14.92 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.21 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  16.07 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.22 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  17.41 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.23 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  16.07 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.24 100% |=======================================================|  10.00 MB  14.92 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.part.25 100% |=======================================================|   2.85 MB   4.57 MB/s Time: 0:00:00
/var/tmp/bundle-BudaOD/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml 100% |==================================================|   7.38 kB   2.94 kB/s Time: 0:00:02
euca-install-image: error (RegisterImageType): Failed to read manifest file: ubuntu-wily-amd64/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw.manifest.xml
{code}

*Steps*

# Set up federated cloud (i.e. multiple regions) - see EUCA-10442
# Create account under one region
{code}
# euare-accountcreate -a test1
test1	002093902049
{code}
# Download credentials for admin user for test account
{code}
# euca-get-credentials -a test1 -u admin test1-admin.zip
# unzip test1-admin.zip
Archive:  test1-admin.zip
To setup the environment run: source /path/to/eucarc
  inflating: eucarc
  inflating: iamrc
  inflating: cloud-cert.pem
  inflating: jssecacerts
  inflating: euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem
  inflating: euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem
{code}
# Source eucarc; confirm multiple regions display
{code}
# source eucarc
# euca-describe-regions
REGION	region-1	http://compute.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	region-2	http://compute.g-22-07.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Download Ubuntu cloud image; convert to raw image
{code}
# wget http://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/wily/current/wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img
# qemu-img convert -O raw wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.img wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw
{code}
# Bundle, upload, and register image to nonnative region
{code}
# euca-install-image -b ubuntu-wily-amd64 -i wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -n ubuntu-wily-x86_64 -r x86_64 -U http://objectstorage.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --virtualization-type hvm --cert test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem --privatekey test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem --ec2cert test1-admin/cloud-cert.pem
{code}
fields.summary: EMI registered by user from nonnative region fails to register

comments.body: sosreports from region 1 and region 2 CLCs attached

Added sosreport from region-1 UFS.  Interesting error in cloud-error.log

This is likely the same issue as EUCA-10984, the image is uploaded to one region, but the register command runs against EC2 in the other region.

Issue here is that euca-install-image used the EC2_URL sourced from the eucarc - which was a different region than the {{-U}} option used.  euca-install-image has an {{--ec2-url}} option which mitigates this issue.  
{code}
# euca-install-image -b ubuntu-wily-amd64 -i wily-server-cloudimg-amd64-disk1.raw -n ubuntu-wily-x86_64 -r x86_64 -U http://objectstorage.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --ec2-url http://compute.h-33.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ --virtualization-type hvm --cert test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-cert.pem --privatekey test1-admin/euca2-admin-af5f63d3-pk.pem --ec2cert test1-admin/cloud-cert.pem
